mean_en: connected with the study of cultures of the past and of periods of history by examining the remains of buildings and objects found in the ground
sentence: More and more pottery has been found in this archaeological site.
sentence_trans: 这个考古遗址发现了越来越多的陶器。
word_etyma: archaeo太古的 + logical……学的 → adj.古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的
